channel.title: Comments on: For richer or (mostly) poorer
channel.description: I do! Want my wedding to look fabulous. I don't! Have $20,000 to spend.

item.title: By: Rachel
item.dc:creator: Rachel
item.description: Jason your a wiener! Food is very important.
item.content:encoded: Jason your a wiener! Food is very important.

item.title: By: Jason
item.dc:creator: Jason
item.description: I totally agree with you, Jen. I'd rather shell out for photos that I can enjoy for the rest of my life rather than a meal that I'm going to feed to my friends and family only once.
item.content:encoded: I totally agree with you, Jen. I’d rather shell out for photos that I can enjoy for the rest of my life rather than a meal that I’m going to feed to my friends and family only once.

item.title: By: JenWill
item.dc:creator: JenWill
item.description: I love this! It's so true and you said it perfectly. Most of these things you enjoy for a day and then they are gone. That's why you need a good photographer in your budget. ;) ... but I am biased.
item.content:encoded: I love this! It’s so true and you said it perfectly. Most of these things you enjoy for a day and then they are gone. That’s why you need a good photographer in your budget. ;) … but I am biased.
